original_text: Aaron and his sons must wear them when they go into the Tent of Meeting. They must also wear them when they go near to the altar to serve me in the Holy Place. Then they will not be guilty. I will not punish them with death. This will always be a rule for Aaron and his descendants.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들이 회막에 들어갈 때에나 제단에 가까이 하여 거룩한 곳에서 섬길 때에 그것들을 입어야 죄를 짊어진 채 죽지 아니하리니 그와 그의 후손이 영원히 지킬 규례니라

sentences.original_text: Aaron and his sons must wear them
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들은 그것들을 입어야 한다

sentences.original_text: when they go into the Tent of Meeting
when they go near to the altar
to serve me in the Holy Place
Then they will not be guilty
I will not punish them with death
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 죽음으로 벌하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: This will always be a rule
